00037 // privileges checking
00038 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('serial_control', 'r');
00039 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('serial_control', 'w');
00040 
00041 if (!$can_read) {
00042     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00043 }
00044 
00045 // page title
00046 $page_title = 'Subscription List';

00048 $biblioID = 0;
00049 if (isset($_GET['biblioID'])) {
00050     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00051 }
00052 if (isset($_POST['biblioID'])) {
00053     $biblioID = (integer)$_POST['biblioID'];
00054 }
00055 
00056 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00057 if (isset($_POST['saveData'])) {
00058     $dateStart = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['dateStart'])));
00059     // $dateEnd = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['dateEnd'])));
00060     $period = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['period'])));
00061     // check form validity
00062     if (!$period OR !$dateStart) {
00063         utility::jsAlert(__('Error inserting subscription data, Subscription Date must be filled!'));
00064     } else {
00065         $data['biblio_id'] = $biblioID;
00066         $data['date_start'] = $dateStart;
00067         // $data['date_end'] = $dateEnd;
00068         $data['period'] = $period;
00069         $data['notes'] = trim($_POST['notes'])==''?'literal{NULL}':trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['notes'])));
00070         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00071         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00072 
00073         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00074         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00075             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00076             // remove input date
00077             unset($data['input_date']);
00078             // filter update record ID
00079             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00080             // update the data
00081             $update = $sql_op->update('serial', $data, 'serial_id='.$updateRecordID);
00082             if ($update) {
00083                 utility::jsAlert(__('Subscription Data Successfully Updated'));
00084                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'serial_control', $_SESSION['realname'].' update subcription('.$updateRecordID.') '.$period);
00085             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Subscription Data FAILED to Updated. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00086             echo '<script type="text/javascript">self.location.href = \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/subscription.php?biblioID='.$biblioID.'\';</script>';
00087             exit();
00088         } else {
00089             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00090             // insert the data
00091             $insert = $sql_op->insert('serial', $data);
00092             $serial_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00093             if ($insert) {
00094                 $exemplar = (integer)$_POST['exemplar'];
00095                 // generate kardex entry
00096                 $serial = new serial($dbs, $serial_id);
00097                 $serial->generateKardexes($exemplar, true);
00098                 // alert
00099                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Subscription Data Successfully Saved'));
00100                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'serial_control', $_SESSION['realname'].' add new subcription('.$sql_op->insert_id.') '.$period);
00101             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Subscription Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error); }
00102             echo '<script type="text/javascript">self.location.href = \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/subscription.php?biblioID='.$biblioID.'\';</script>';
00103             exit();
00104         }
00105     }
00106     exit();
00107 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00108     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00109         die();
00110     }
00111     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00112     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00113     $failed_array = array();
00114     $error_num = 0;
00115     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00116         // make an array
00117         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00118     }
00119 
00120     // get biblio ID for this subcription
00121     $biblio_q = $dbs->query('SELECT biblio_id FROM serial WHERE serial_id='.( isset($_POST['itemID'][0])?$_POST['itemID'][0]:'0' ).' LIMIT 1');
00122     $biblio_d = $biblio_q->fetch_row();
00123     $biblioID = $biblio_d[0];
00124     // loop array
00125     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00126         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00127         if (!$sql_op->delete('serial', 'serial_id='.$itemID)) {
00128             $error_num++;
00129         } else {
00130             // also delete kardex data
00131             $sql_op->delete('kardex', 'serial_id='.$itemID);
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     // error alerting
00136     if ($error_num == 0) {
00137         utility::jsAlert(__('Subscription data successfully deleted'));
00138     } else {
00139         utility::jsAlert(__('Subscription data FAILED to deleted!'));
00140     }
00141 }
00142 /* RECORD OPERATION END */

00144 // start the output buffering
00145 ob_start();
00146 /* main content */
00147 if ($can_write AND ( isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail') )) {
00148     /* RECORD FORM */
00149     $itemID = (integer)isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:0;
00150     $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM serial WHERE serial_id='.$itemID);
00151     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00152 
00153     // create new instance
00154     $form = new simbio_form_table('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00155     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00156 
00157     // form table attributes
00158     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00159     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00160     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00161 
00162     // edit mode flag set
00163     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00164         $form->edit_mode = true;
00165         // record ID for delete process
00166         $form->record_id = $itemID;
00167         // form record title
00168         $form->record_title = $rec_d['period'];
00169         // submit button attribute
00170         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00171     }
00172 
00173     /* Form Element(s) */
00174     // serial date start
00175     $form->addDateField('dateStart', __('Subscription Start').'*', $rec_d['date_start']);
00176     if (!$form->edit_mode) {
00177         // serial exemplar
00178         $form->addTextField('text', 'exemplar', __('Total Exemplar Expected').'*', '1');
00179     }
00180     // serial periode name
00181     $form->addTextField('text', 'period', __('Period Name').'*', $rec_d['period'], 'style="width: 100%;"');
00182     // serial notes
00183     $form->addTextField('textarea', 'notes', __('Subscription Notes'), $rec_d['notes'], 'style="width: 100%;" rows="3"');
00184     // serial gmd
00185         // get gmd data related to this record from database
00186         $gmd_q = $dbs->query('SELECT gmd_id, gmd_name FROM mst_gmd');
00187         $gmd_options = array();
00188         while ($gmd_d = $gmd_q->fetch_row()) {
00189             $gmd_options[] = array($gmd_d[0], $gmd_d[1]);
00190         }
00191     $form->addSelectList('gmdID', __('GMD'), $gmd_options, $rec_d['gmd_id']);
00192     // serial biblio ID
00193     $form->addHidden('biblioID', $biblioID);
00194 
00195     // edit mode messagge
00196     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00197         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('You are going to edit Subscription data').' : <b>'.$rec_d['period'].'</b><div><i>'.$rec_d['notes'].'</i></div></div>'; //mfc
00198     }
00199     // print out the form object
00200     echo $form->printOut();
00201 } else {
00202     /* SUBSCRIPTION LIST */
00203     function serialTitle($obj_db, $array_data)
00204     {
00205         $_output = '';
00206         $_output .= '<div style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%;">'.$array_data[1].'</div>';
00207         $_output .= '<div style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 90%;"><a href="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'serial_control/kardex.php?serialID='.$array_data[0].'" title="'.__('View/Edit Kardex Detail').'">'.__('View/Edit Kardex Detail').'</a></div>';
00208         return $_output;
00209     }
00210 
00211     // table spec
00212     $table_spec = 'serial AS s';
00213 
00214     // create datagrid
00215     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00216     $datagrid->setSQLColumn('s.serial_id',
00217         's.period AS \''.__('Period Name').'\'',
00218         's.date_start AS \''.__('Subscription Start').'\'',
00219         's.notes AS \''.__('Subscription Notes').'\'');
00220     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00221         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{serialTitle}');
00222     } else {
00223         $datagrid->invisible_fields = array(0);
00224         $datagrid->modifyColumnContent(1, 'callback{serialTitle}');
00225     }
00226     $datagrid->setSQLorder('s.date_start DESC');
00227 
00228     $criteria = 's.biblio_id='.$biblioID;
00229     // is there any search
00230     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00231         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00232         $criteria .= " AND (s.period LIKE '%$keyword%' OR s.notes LIKE '%$keyword%')";
00233     }
00234     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00235 
00236     // set table and table header attributes
00237     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00238     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00239     $datagrid->using_AJAX = false;
00240     // set delete proccess URL
00241     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00242     // special properties
00243     $datagrid->column_width = array(0 => '45%');
00244 
00245     // put the result into variables
00246     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00247     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00248         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00249         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00250     }
00251 
00252     echo $datagrid_result;
00253 }
00254 /* main content end */
